resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.

fields.summary: Hive should carry out timestamp computations in UTC

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: Hive should carry out timestamp computations in UTC

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Related to HIVE-12192. Create new method that prints values in UTC.
fields.summary: Extend storage-api to print timestamp values in UTC

comments.body: [~ashutoshc], Owen suggested in ORC-341 to create a boolean {{useUTC}} in {{TimestampColumnVector}}. Then, stringify would print the timestamp with UTC or system time zone depending on that boolean. It seems like a good idea, I will explore it and update this issue accordingly.
